basics.name: Raven Muse
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist & AI/ML Full-stack developer
basics.summary: I'm a seasoned tech professional with over 10 years of experience in data science, AI/ML full-stack software development. As a former Senior Data Scientist and Software Architect at Dmall, I gained extensive hands-on experience in machine learning, big data analytics, and LLM technologies. I’ve successfully led the development of complex systems, including recommendation systems, user operation systems, public opinion monitoring, supply chain optimization, and AI data assistants. Currently, I'm advancing cutting-edge research in LLM and CV algorithms at a research institute affiliated with Tsinghua University.
